About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

It was in late 2019 that I heard the following quote from Brian Tracy: "If you do not love your job then get out of it like you would get out of a burning house." At the time I was unethusiastically working full-time as a Credit Analyst and dabbling with web development during lunch breaks and my free time. My undergraduate studies in Applied Mathematics naturally attracted me to the logic puzzles and problem solving associated with code. I loved most the fact that I was challenged constantly, and that there was always something else to learn next. It didn't take long before I decided to leave this job and teach myself how to code full-time. I've since then taught myself Computer Science Data Structures & Algorithms, as well as the following technologies:

Front-End Skills

  • JavaScript (ES6+)
  • React.js (Hooks & Context API)
  • Redux
  • HTML/CSS/SASS
  • Webpack & Babel

Back-End Skills

  • Node.js
  • Express
  • MongoDB (Mongoose)
  • GraphQL
  • Next.js

Development & Workflow

  • Git & GitHub
  • Agile Methodologies
  • Amazon Web Services
  • Postman
  • Heroku
